english_fact: The characters Bert and Ernie on Sesame Street were named after Bert the cop and Ernie the taxi driver in Frank Capra`s "Its A Wonderful Life."
translated_fact: I personaggi Bert ed Ernie in Sesame Street prendevano il nome da Bert the Cop ed Ernie il tassista di "It's A Wonderful Life" di Frank Capra.
